mapper.select: select r.* from admin_role_relation ar left join role r on ar.role_id = r.id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId}

select rs.id , rs.create_time createTime, rs.admin_id, rs.category_id , rs.description , rs.name, rs.url from admin_role_relation ar left join role r on ar.role_id = r.id left join role_resource_relation rrr on r.id = rrr.role_id left join resource rs on rs.id = rrr.resource_id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId} and rs.id is not null group by rs.id
